price: 你的主是最知道天地万物的。我确已使一部分先知超越另一部分；我曾把经典《宰布尔》赏赐达五德。
arabic: وَرَبُّكَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَلَقَدۡ فَضَّلۡنَا بَعۡضَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُۥدَ زَبُورٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: warabbuka aʿlamu biman fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi walaqad faḍḍalnā baʿḍa al-nabiyīna ʿalā baʿḍin waātaynā dāwūda zabūran
